feed.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?

entry.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?
entry.summary: On December 31, 2013, Mike Hearn wrote that moving to different servers was controversial and no progress was being made. However, the site was temporarily moved onto a dedicated server which experienced a meltdown under the load. Mike Hearn clarifies that Drak's threat model is not improved by SSL but rather it would be improved by increasing the use of signature checking. He emphasizes that flat-out misinformation never improves security.
